com.box.boxjavalibv2.resourcemanagers

Class BoxItemsManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.box.boxjavalibv2.resourcemanagers.AbstractBoxResourceManager
      • com.box.boxjavalibv2.resourcemanagers.BoxItemsManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoxItemsManager, IBoxResourceManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoxFilesManagerImpl, BoxFoldersManageImpl, BoxSearchManagerImpl

    public class BoxItemsManagerImpl
extends AbstractBoxResourceManager
implements IBoxItemsManager
    Use this class to execute requests synchronously against the Box REST API(V2). Full details about the Box API can be found at http://developers.box.com/docs . You must have an OpenBox application with a valid API key to use the Box API. All methods in this class are executed in the invoking thread, and therefore are NOT safe to execute in the UI thread of your application. You should only use this class if you already have worker threads or AsyncTasks that you want to incorporate the Box API into.
